name: Ensure that Encryption key will not expire within the next 14 days
description: Encryption key expiring within the next 14 days
body: C﻿yscale looks for encryption keys expiring within the next 14 days
remediationDescription:
D﻿epending on the provider and service that you use, check out the following resources:

#### A﻿WS
*﻿ [Managing AWS KMS keys] (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/kms/latest/developerguide/getting-started.html)
